image_generation.description: Advanced image generation model optimized for creative visuals
image_generation.why: Best-in-class image generation with fast inference and high quality outputs

text_generation.description: Advanced language model for text generation and reasoning
text_generation.why: Excellent reasoning capabilities, code generation, and instruction following

embeddings.description: High-quality text embeddings for semantic search
embeddings.why: Industry standard embeddings with excellent semantic understanding

payments.why: Most developer-friendly payments API with excellent documentation and reliability

authentication.description: Identity platform for authentication and authorization
authentication.why: Enterprise-grade auth with SSO, MFA, and social login out of the box

vector_database.description: Vector database optimized for AI applications
vector_database.why: Purpose-built for similarity search with low latency and high scalability

file_storage.why: Industry standard, highly durable, integrates with CDNs and other AWS services

analytics.why: Self-hostable, feature flags, session replay, and A/B testing included

email_transactional.why: Simple API, React email templates, excellent deliverability

email_marketing.why: Established platform with templates, automation, and audience management

framework_frontend.description: React framework with SSR and static generation
framework_frontend.why: Best React framework with App Router, Server Components, and great DX

framework_backend.why: Batteries included - ORM, admin panel, auth, and REST framework

realtime.description: Hosted WebSocket service for real-time features
realtime.why: Simple API, handles scaling, presence channels and private channels

search.description: Hosted search API with typo tolerance
search.why: Lightning fast search, great relevance, easy to integrate
